name: Data & Marketing Association Finland (FIDMA), Suomen Asiakkuusmarkkinointiliitto ry
goal: The objective is to support and improve the operating conditions of the data driven business and marketing and the members of the association in establishing a good and trusting relationship with consumers, media, business, industry, the authorities and government institutions as well as providing self regulation, member services, research, training and events.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: All activities in the areas of data protection, customer experience, digitalization, marketing and ecommerce.
